description: [``botocore``] Provides description of new Amazon Bedrock runtime datasource.
[``botocore``] Change `CustomDomainConfig` from a required to an optional parameter for the `UpdateUserPoolDomain` operation.
[``botocore``] This release includes a new API for modifying instance network-performance-options after launch.
[``botocore``] This is a documentation only update to address various tickets for Amazon ECS.
[``botocore``] Amazon Keyspaces: adding the list of IAM actions required by the UpdateKeyspace API.
[``botocore``] H265 outputs now support disabling the deblocking filter.
